column1: in memory of sarah v. ekema -- peck funeral home| sarah v. ekema. june 29
column3: 2015. biography. hartsellememorial service for sarah ekema
column7: 2015 at 3:00 pm at peck funeral home chapel with bro. joey wood officiating and peck funeral home directing. burial will be in hartselle city cemetery. visitation will be sunday
column9: 2015 from 2:30 pm to 3:00 pm at the funeral home. mrs. ekema died on sunday
column11: 2015 at decatur morgan hospital. she was born june 29
column15: to henry vande. kamp and nellie post vande. kamp. she was a an lpn for pella regional health center in pella
column17: before her retirement. she was preceded in death by her husband: rev. john peter ekema and her parents. survivors include:four sons:ken ekema (jolene)
